name: mostly_credible_post
description: checks the post and flags as mostly credible
condition: avg_stance_support > 0.3 && avg_stance_support < 0.4 && avg_stance_query < 0.2 && avg_stance_deny < 0.2 && avg_stance_comment >0.4 && misinfome_credibility_value > 0.33 && misinfome_credibility_value <= 0.66 && misinfome_crebility_confidence > 0.5
